nodes.body:
This particle is very common, and may be used with both honorific and ordinary forms. It conveys a sense of urgency or danger, or implies a greater degree of coercion.

  • སེམས་ཁྲལ་མ་བྱེད་ཨ། “Don’t worry!”
  • གཟབ་བཟབ་གནང་ཨ། “Be careful!”
  • མ་ལབ་ཨ། “Just don’t talk!”
nodes.title: About The Particle ཨ་
